name: Astro Adventure
description:
Astro Adventure is a rescue mission based in outer space. Members of your team and valuable data has been lost.

Navigate your way around space following your tracks to recover the data and your team.

Watch out for the meteors along the way as you enter dangerous zones. You'll have to move quick as some of the meteors are travelling at great speeds!

Astro Adventure is a fast paced arcade game designed to give players an exhilarating experience, so why not test yourself and save the day!

Challenge your friends and see who among you can be the hero!

Good Luck.
